channel.title: PerezHilton
channel.description: Since 2004, Hollywood's most sassy website has been delivering the juiciest celebrity gossip. The blog is The go-to source for daily happenings in Hollywood. Written by the internet's most notorious gossip columnist, Perez Hilton (Mario Lavandeira).

item.title: Taylor Swift Searching For ANOTHER Multi-Million Dollar Mansion!
item.dc:creator: Perez Hilton
item.description: Beating the boys is REALLY paying off for Taylor Swift! We know Tay Tay's wallet is stacked thanks to her MASSIVE Red tour tickets sales, however now we have a hint of just HOW loaded she is. Swifty is already neighbors with the Kennedys, but the 22 songstress is once again searching for a mansion [...]
item.content:encoded:
Beating the boys is REALLY paying off for Taylor Swift!

We know Tay Tay's wallet is stacked thanks to her MASSIVE Red tour tickets sales, however now we have a hint of just HOW loaded she is.

Swifty is already neighbors with the Kennedys, but the 22 songstress is once again searching for a mansion to call her own and this time Taylor is looking at a AHmazing Rhode Island property with an GIANT price tag.

The Harkness House, with more than 11,000 square on 5.23 acres of property, is going for an upwards of $20 million.

And we were impressed by Christina Aguilera's new $10 million mansion! HA!

Tay brought her friends and fam to look at the property on Monday and reportedly fell in love!!!

We always knew she was a smart girl!

Fame might not be forever, but real estate investments ALWAYS pay off.

Well... fingers crossed anyways!

[Image via WENN.]

item.content:encoded:
Kim Kardashian's youngest sister wasn't always lucky in love!

Before she found the love of her life in Lamar Odom, Khloe Kardashian's dating experiences were actually pretty terrible!

One time, while she was engaged in a sexy, steamy video chat with a man from NYC, Khloe spotted a... well, you'd better let her tell you herself!

Ch-ch-check out this HIGHlariously heartbreaking clip from Ryan Seacrest With the Kardashians: An E! News Presentation (above)!

Aww! How traumatic for poor Khloe!

Tune in to E! at 9 pm this Sunday for more fabulous Kardashian family dramz!!!

item.title: Channing Tatum & Jonah Hill Are Popping Funny-Bonerz Once Again In 21 Jump Street Sequel!
item.dc:creator: Perez Hilton
item.description: Sweeeeeet! It's been over a year since 21 Jump Street blew us away with it's HIGHlarity, but 20th Century Fox just confirmed we're finally getting a sequel! The gloriously godlike Channing Tatum plans to reprise his role alongside partner Jonah Hill as two misfit cops who infiltrate a high school from the inside out!! At 32 and 29 [...]
item.content:encoded:
Sweeeeeet!

It's been over a year since 21 Jump Street blew us away with it's HIGHlarity, but 20th Century Fox just confirmed we're finally getting a sequel!

The gloriously godlike Channing Tatum plans to reprise his role alongside partner Jonah Hill as two misfit cops who infiltrate a high school from the inside out!!

At 32 and 29 respectively, these two marvelous men are no spring chickens! Maybe they should go undercover as grad students this time, LOLz!!

Hopefully the delicious Dave Franco, who played a drug dealer in the first film, will return, too!!

The 21 Jump Street sequel shoots this summer and should be ready in time for a 2014 release!

[Image via 20th Century Fox.]

item.title: Klaus 'Wants To Be King' In The New Vampire Diaries Spinoff Promo! Watch HERE!
item.dc:creator: Perez Hilton
item.description: Next week’s Originals episode has us drooling in anticipation. Airing on April 25th, the episode, as reported earlier, will serve as the show’s spinoff’s backdoor pilot, and boy, does it look AH-MAZING!!! Ch-ch-check out the newly released promo (above) and see for yourselves as you’re “welcome[d] to the dark side of New Orleans, where the living are [...]
item.content:encoded:
Next week’s Originals episode has us drooling in anticipation.

Airing on April 25th, the episode, as reported earlier, will serve as the show’s spinoff’s backdoor pilot, and boy, does it look AH-MAZING!!!

Ch-ch-check out the newly released promo (above) and see for yourselves as you’re “welcome[d] to the dark side of New Orleans, where the living are easily lost and the dead stick around to play.”

It’s EXPLOSIVE.

P.S. Klaus (Joseph Morgan) has NEVER been seksier or scarier -- with that chilling one-liner: “I wanna be king...” Yikes!

item.title: Bruno Mars Has Kinky Circus Wedding Plans!!
item.dc:creator: Perez Hilton
item.description: When we think of our dream wedding, a circus theme is probably not the first thing that pops into our heads…But hey, it could work! Bruno Mars, on the other hand, already has his perfect circus wedding all planned out! Not only does the singer want to be surrounded by circus-esque things on his special [...]
item.content:encoded:
When we think of our dream wedding, a circus theme is probably not the first thing that pops into our heads...But hey, it could work!

Bruno Mars, on the other hand, already has his perfect circus wedding all planned out! Not only does the singer want to be surrounded by circus-esque things on his special day, but he also wants to be a part of a full circus performance!!

The singer proudly proclaimed:

“I’m doing pyrotechnics at my wedding and I’m gonna learn gymnastics, juggling and unicycling. It’ll probably be at the top of a mountain.”

Can't wait to see that, Bruno!! Ha!

And if that isn’t crazy enough, instead of a traditional wedding song Bruno would rather opt for the Rocky theme song, “Eye of the Tiger”. Can't say that's all too surprising--if you're going to have an unconventional wedding, why not rocky an unconventional song??

Well that should be an different, but FUN, wedding! Maybe he'll even write a circus-themed album for the occasion!!

We hope his future bride is as circus-crazed as he is, LOLz!!

[Image via WENN.]

item.title: Babies And Equality!
item.dc:creator: Perez Hilton
item.description: What does our weekend consist of? Lots of quality time with Perez, Jr. - including a pool party for friends with kids! Yup, we're gonna get him in the water already! Pediatrician gave us the go-ahead and we are so excited!!! We're also happy to be able to attend the GLAAD Media Awards in Los Angeles [...]
item.content:encoded:
What does our weekend consist of? Lots of quality time with Perez, Jr. - including a pool party for friends with kids! Yup, we're gonna get him in the water already! Pediatrician gave us the go-ahead and we are so excited!!!

We're also happy to be able to attend the GLAAD Media Awards in Los Angeles on Saturday and support the great work they do!

Besides that, we're just so happy to stay home and chill. Play with our son. Take care of Momma Perez, who is recuperating from knee surgery. And just chill!

What is YOUR weekend looking like?

Thank you - as always - for being so awesome and for all your support!

And thanks, as well, to our super rad advertisers!

PLEASE take a moment to click on their links below!

item.title: Claire Danes Spends $6.8 Million on GORGEOUS West Village Home!!
item.dc:creator: Perez Hilton
item.description: Claire Danes, leading lady of the Showtime hit Homeland, recently made a HUGE purchase — a new homeland for her new family of three!! Claire and her husband, Hugh Dancy, decided that a $6.8 million townhouse in Manhattan’s West Village was the PERFECT nesting ground to raise their newborn son, Cyrus Michael Christopher. The [...]
item.content:encoded:
Claire Danes, leading lady of the Showtime hit Homeland, recently made a HUGE purchase -- a new homeland for her new family of three!!

Claire and her husband, Hugh Dancy, decided that a $6.8 million townhouse in Manhattan’s West Village was the PERFECT nesting ground to raise their newborn son, Cyrus Michael Christopher.

The five-bedroom home is four-stories high and features a bright, stylish living area with plenty of outdoor space. The place ALSO includes a courtyard, a terrace, a library, a roof garden, stunning views, an open plan kitchen, and preeettttyy much everything a dream home would EVER contain!!

Claire sold her Soho home in November to make way for this bigger-and-better model.

We’re so happy for Danes and her fam and hope she’s enjoying the new place! In the meantime, we’ll just enjoy it vicariously through the photo gallery (below)!!

[Image via WENN.]

item.title: Ryan Gosling Gets Bloody In Second NSFW Only God Forgives Trailer!

Now the Place Beyond The Pines star is getting down and dirty for revenge in his reunion with Drive director Nicolas Winding Refn. Ch-ch-check out the video (above) to see the next NSFW [...]
item.content:encoded:
Ryan Gosling is almost as well known for his choice of controversial film projects as he is for his abs- hey, we said almost!

Now the Place Beyond The Pines star is getting down and dirty for revenge in his reunion with Drive director Nicolas Winding Refn.

Ch-ch-check out the video (above) to see the next NSFW red band trailer for Only God Forgives!

Ouch! That looks like it hurts! But it's OK because we're in love, right? LOLz!

item.title: New Zealand Legalizes Same-Sex Marriage And Sings About It! Watch The AHmazing Moment HERE!!!
item.dc:creator: Perez Hilton
item.description: How moving!!! The fight for marriage equality around the world is FAR from over, but equal rights just took a GIANT leap after New Zealand legalized same-sex marriage yesterday. Those who filled the public galleries of the courtroom to witness Parliament vote to permit same-sex marriage in a 77 to 44 vote were so excited [...]
item.content:encoded:
How moving!!!

The fight for marriage equality around the world is FAR from over, but equal rights just took a GIANT leap after New Zealand legalized same-sex marriage yesterday.

Those who filled the public galleries of the courtroom to witness Parliament vote to permit same-sex marriage in a 77 to 44 vote were so excited that they burst into song!

The crowd sang New Zealand's indigenous song Pokarekare Ana to serenade the bill's brave sponsor, lesbian Louisa Wall.

Ch-ch-check out the extraordinary moment (above)!!!

And cross your fingers with us that ALL of the US will soon follow in New Zealand's fair footsteps!

item.title: Meiko Makes Bad Things Sound SO Good In An Acoustic Version Of Her New Song!
item.dc:creator: Perez Hilton
item.description: Slow down, Meiko! We can hardly keep up with you! Just yesterday, the LA singer gave us an EXCLUSIVE first listen to her awesome new single Bad Things! But if that wasn't enough to satisfy your eardrums, she posted a video of herself doing an acoustic version of the song as well! Ch-ch-check out the sweet performance [...]
item.content:encoded:
Slow down, Meiko! We can hardly keep up with you!

Just yesterday, the LA singer gave us an EXCLUSIVE first listen to her awesome new single Bad Things! But if that wasn't enough to satisfy your eardrums, she posted a video of herself doing an acoustic version of the song as well!

Ch-ch-check out the sweet performance (above)!

We're not sure which one we like better, because they're both pretty amazing, but we're always impressed when someone is able to still sound so good without all of the fancy bells and whistles!

What about U guys?? Which version do U prefer?
